links.title: LG Display losses mount on falling panel prices
links.description: Technology 21 minutes ago (Jul 24, 2018 08:17PM ET) Â© Reuters. FILE PHOTO: A woman looks at a LG Electronics' organic light-emitting diode (OLED) TV sets, which are made with LG Display flat screens, at its store in Seoul SEOUL (Reuters) - South Korea's Co Ltd (KS:) said on Wednesday its losses mounted in the second quarter due to falling panel prices and weaker demand from television and handset makers.
